articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: How the Wuhan coronavirus spreads and what’s being done about it
articles.description: On Thursday the World Health Organization declared the Wuhan coronavirus a global health emergency. Here's what you need to know.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: Global companies enter lockdown mode as coronavirus outbreak rocks China
articles.description: Corporations are responding to the spread of coronavirus by placing restrictions and outright bans on employee travel to China, indefinitely closing offices in China, and telling employees to work from home.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: ‘It’s survival of the fittest:’ Qantas CEO says coronavirus could drive Asian airlines out of business
articles.description: Budget carriers, which rely heavily on leisure travel demand, have been hit the hardest from the travel restrictions. Of those that have announced flight suspensions, half of them are low-cost carriers.

articles.author: Erik Sherman
articles.title: As the coronavirus spreads, these stocks are the most exposed
articles.description: Companies like United and Starbucks have taken the biggest hits so far, but there is plenty of pain to go around.
